mapper.select: SELECT id,document_number,file_number,box_number,folder_number,name,time,effective_time, security_level,responsibility,remarks,year,page FROM document where name like '%${name}%'
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET document_number=#{documentNumber}, file_number = #{fileNumber}, box_number=#{boxNumber}, folder_number=#{folderNumber}, name=#{name}, time=#{time}, effective_time=#{effectiveTime}, security_level=#{securityLevel}, responsibility=#{responsibility}, remarks=#{ remarks}, year=#{year}, page=#{page}, WHERE id = #{id}
